body_html: To be clear, it's not an issue with the NHWC -> NCHW conversion, rather this is a problem with the NHWC format which is the default in tensorflow, so I would expect this to affect the majority of use cases
body_text: To be clear, it's not an issue with the NHWC -> NCHW conversion, rather this is a problem with the NHWC format which is the default in tensorflow, so I would expect this to affect the majority of use cases
body: To be clear, it's not an issue with the NHWC -> NCHW conversion, rather this is a problem with the NHWC format which is the default in tensorflow, so I would expect this to affect the majority of use cases
